short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Getting Google Analytics for comparison on Ad platforms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upburst dynamically inserts your Shopify and Google Analytics tracking data inside your Facebook ads manager. Your store analytics data is matched to each campaign, ad set and ad so that you can make informed decisions on your ads based on Shopify and Google Analytics tracking.
